Notes: Synchronous switcher, load monitoring,3 charge modes.
Selectable charge currents, 5 charge modes. Also acts as LDO when no battery present.
Selectable charge currents, only 2 caps and a resistor required external
2 status LEDs and a thermal compensation circuit
Meant for low capacity cells like li-ion coin cells
External Pass Transistor, 1% accuracy, programmable charge current.

The bq2409x has a single power output that charges the battery. A system load can be placed in parallel with the battery as long as the average system load does not keep the battery from charging fully during the 10-hour safety timer.
Temperature overheat protection because of small size.
